creator: AirGSM Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Say alo to freedom!

Airalo offers you travel data packs at truly local rates for over 190+ countries and regions globally. Purchase a data pack before you even leave for your trip, and never worry about staying connected while on your adventures.

Why use Airalo?
- Installation in 5 minutes or less
- Easy top-ups, wherever you are
- Keep your number as you travel
- No more fumbling to change SIMs
- No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

How does it work?

Step 1: Be an owner of one of the following devices**:
- Samsung Galaxy S20
- Samsung Galaxy S20+
- Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra
- Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
- Samsung Galaxy Fold
- Google Pixel 3 & 3 XL*
- Google Pixel 3a & 3a XL
- Google Pixel 4 & 4 XL*
- Nuu Mobile X5
- Motorola Razr 2019

* eSim enabled only for AU, CA, DE, ES, GB, JP, TW, and US. See your carrier for details.

Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
Airalo has eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our list of partners and data packs.

Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
Installation is as easy as scanning a QR code. You can also manage and top-up your eSIMs with your Airalo account.

** Device compatibility also varies from country to country.
---

Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: The world's first eSIM store with truly local rates for global travellers.

title: Airalo: eSIM Store

creator: AirGSM Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Airalo allows you save up to 10x on mobile roaming data fees with amazing eSIM technology. Get one of our eSIM travel mobile data cards at affordable rates (starting from $3) in over 190+ countries and regions 🌎 Just add a data pack to your dual SIM phone before you even leave for your trip, and never worry about staying connected while on your adventures.

Say alo to freedom! 🎉

✈️ Who is Airalo best for?
Airalo is a perfect solution for anyone who travels - it doesn't matter whether you're a seafarer, airline worker or you just want to enjoy mobile data while visiting friends in other country - Airalo is here to provide you constant connectivity and solve your pain point - crazy high roaming bills 💸

🤑 How much does it cost?
* eSIM starts from $3 for 1GB of data.

⭐ Why use Airalo?
* No more huge roaming data fees ✌️
* Installation in 5 minutes or less
* Easy top-ups, wherever you are
* Keep your number as you travel
* No more fiddling to change SIMs
* No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded-SIM technology. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates with firmware installed in a chip that’s soldered into your phone’s circuitry. While some devices have both a physical SIM card tray in addition to an eSIM, some of the newest models have only an eSIM.

📲 What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can download directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your phone!
* You get access to local data service at local prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

📶 What devices support eSIM?
Smartphones that have dual sim capacity and eSIM technology embedded:
* Samsung Galaxy S20
* Samsung Galaxy S20+
* Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra
* Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
* Samsung Galaxy Fold
* Google Pixel 3 & 3 XL*
* Google Pixel 3a & 3a XL
* Google Pixel 4 & 4 XL*
* Google Pixel 5
* Nuu Mobile X5
* Motorola Razr 2019
* MyPhone Hammer Blade 3
* MyPhone Hammer Explorer Pro

* eSim enabled only for AU, CA, DE, ES, GB, JP, TW, and US. See your carrier for details.
**Device compatibility varies from country to country.

🤔 How does it work?
* Step 1: Install Airalo app

* Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
(Airalo offers eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our list of data packs.)

* Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
Installation is as easy as scanning a QR code or manually inserting an activation code provided. You can also manage and top-up your eSIMs with your Airalo account.

* Step 4: Enjoy connectivity whenever you are!

❤️ Why we love eSIM?
* You aren’t disconnected during transit. With an eSIM, you can simply activate your service once you’ve arrived and you’re connected immediately.
* You don’t have to mess around with fragile, tiny hardware. An eSIM is handled through an app, making things easier for everyone.
* It’s much easier to switch plans. Every eSIM data plan from Airalo is prepaid
so you can top up your service or switch your service whenever you want.
* Prices are clear and fair with no hidden fees. Every seasoned traveler has experienced the "joys" of getting ripped off. That doesn’t happen when you can clearly read what you’re getting when you tap “Buy.”
* You can store multiple eSIMs on one device. That gives you the freedom to purchase your data plans ahead of time and simply activate them on arrival.

Enjoy!

---
Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
T&Cs: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: Global and Local Mobile Data for eSIM capable phones - Google Pixel, Samsung S20

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded-SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can download directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without this old-school plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your phone!

* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

title: Airalo: eSIM Data Packs. No More Roaming Fees.

creator: AirGSM Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Airalo allows you to save up to 10x on mobile roaming data fees with amazing eSIM technology. Get one of our prepaid eSIM travel mobile data cards at affordable rates (starting from $4.5) in over 190+ countries and regions to enjoy global connectivity 🌎 Just add a Data Pack to your dual SIM smartphone and never worry about staying connected while on your adventures.

Say alo to freedom! 🎉

✈️ Who is Airalo best for?
Airalo is a perfect solution for anyone who travels - it doesn't matter whether you're a seafarer, airline worker or you just want to enjoy mobile data while visiting friends in other countries - Airalo is here to provide you constant connectivity and solve your pain point - crazy high roaming bills 💸

🤑 How much does it cost?
* eSIM from Airalo starts from $4.5 for 1GB of data.

⭐ Why use Airalo?
* No more huge roaming data fees ✌️
* Installation in 5 minutes or less
* Easy top-ups, wherever you are
* Keep your number as you travel
* No more fiddling to change SIMs
* No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded-SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

📲 What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can download directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without this old-school plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your phone!
* You get access to local data service at affordable prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

📲 Does an eSIM come with a number?
* Some of our eSIMs do and we're working on adding more into our store for your convenience. Check the eSIMs description for details.

📶 What devices support eSIM?

Smartphones that have dual sim capacity and eSIM technology embedded, like:
* Samsung Galaxy S20
* Samsung Galaxy S20+
* Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra
* Samsung Galaxy S21
* Samsung Galaxy S21+
* Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
* Samsung Galaxy Z Flip
* Samsung Galaxy Fold
* Google Pixel 3 & 3 XL*
* Google Pixel 3a & 3a XL
* Google Pixel 4 & 4 XL*
* Google Pixel 5
* Nuu Mobile X5
* Motorola Razr 2019

* eSim enabled only for AU, CA, DE, ES, GB, JP, TW, and US. See your carrier for details.
**Device compatibility varies from country to country.

🤔 How does it work?
* Step 1: Install Airalo app

* Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
(Airalo offers eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our list of data packs.)

* Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
Installation is as easy as scanning a QR code or manually inserting an activation code provided. You can also manage and top-up your eSIMs with your Airalo account.

* Step 4: Enjoy connectivity whenever you are!

❤️ Why we love eSIM?
* You aren’t disconnected during transit. With an eSIM, you can simply activate your service once you’ve arrived and you’re connected immediately.
* You don’t have to mess around with fragile, tiny hardware. An eSIM is handled through an app, making things easier for everyone.
* It’s much easier to switch plans. Every eSIM data plan from Airalo is prepaid and requires no contract, so you can top up your service or switch your service whenever you want.
* Prices are clear and fair with no hidden fees.
* You can store multiple eSIMs on one device. That gives you the freedom to purchase your data plans ahead of time and simply activate them on arrival.

Enjoy!

---
Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: Global and Local Mobile Data for eSIM capable phones - Google Pixel, Samsung S20

Airalo is a perfect solution for anyone who travels - it doesn't matter whether you're a seafarer, flight crew, on a business trip or you just want to enjoy mobile data while visiting other countries - We are here to provide you with instant connectivity and solve your travel connectivity problems.

🤑 How much does it cost?
* eSIMs from Airalo start from $4.5 for 1GB of data.
* You can save with our Referral Program - get $3 for every user you refer.

⭐ Why use Airalo?
* No more huge roaming data fees ✌️
* Installation in 2 minutes or less
* Easy top-ups, wherever you are
* Keep your number as you travel
* No more fiddling to change SIMs
* No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

📲 What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can install directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without this old-school plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your eSIM compatible device!
* You get access to local data services at affordable prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card, WiFi or pay for expensive roaming.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

📲 Does an eSIM come with a number?
* Some of our eSIMs do and we're working on adding more into our store for your convenience. Check your eSIM’s description for details.

📶 What devices support eSIM?
You can find an updated list of eSIM compatible devices on this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

🤔 How does it work?
* Step 1: Install the Airalo app

* Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
(Airalo has eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our coverage.)

* Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
Installation is as easy as scanning a QR code or manually inserting an activation code provided. You can also manage and top-up your eSIMs with your Airalo account.

* Step 4: Enjoy connectivity whenever you are!

❤️ Why do we love eSIM?
* You aren’t disconnected during transit. With an eSIM, you can simply activate your service once you’ve arrived and you’re connected immediately.
* You don’t have to mess around with fragile, tiny hardware. Your eSIM is handled through an app, making things easier for everyone.
* It’s much easier to switch plans. Every eSIM from Airalo is prepaid and requires no contract, so you can top up your service or switch your plan whenever you want.
* Prices are clear and fair with no hidden fees.
* You can store multiple eSIMs on one device. That gives you the freedom to purchase your eSIMs ahead of time and simply activate them on arrival.

Enjoy!

---
Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy

title: Airalo: eSIM Data Packs

creator: AirGSM Pte. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Airalo allows you to save up to 10x on mobile roaming data fees with amazing eSIM technology. Get one of our prepaid eSIM plans at affordable rates (starting from $4.5) in over 190+ countries and regions to enjoy global connectivity 🌎 Just add an eSIM to your eSIM compatible device and never worry about staying connected while on your adventures.

Say ‘alo’ to freedom! 🎉

✈️ Who is Airalo best for?
Airalo is a perfect solution for anyone who travels - it doesn't matter whether you're a seafarer, flight crew, on a business trip or you just want to enjoy mobile data while visiting other countries - We are here to provide you with instant connectivity and solve your travel connectivity problems.

🤑 How much does it cost?
* eSIMs from Airalo start from $4.5 for 1GB of data.
* You can save with our Referral Program - get $3 for every user you refer.


⭐ Why use Airalo?
* No more huge roaming data fees ✌️
* Installation in 2 minutes or less
* Easy top-ups, wherever you are
* Keep your number as you travel
* No more fiddling to change SIMs
* No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

📲 What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can install directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, but without this old-school plastic SIM card you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIM is a true technological revolution and we bring it right into your eSIM compatible device!
* You get access to local data services at affordable prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card, WiFi or pay for expensive roaming.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

📲 Does an eSIM come with a number?
* Some of our eSIMs do and we're working on adding more into our store for your convenience. Check your eSIM’s description for details.

📶 What devices support eSIM?
You can find an updated list of eSIM compatible devices on this link: https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

🤔 How does it work?
* Step 1: Install the Airalo app

* Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
(Airalo has eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our coverage.)

* Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
Installation is as easy as scanning a QR code or manually inserting an activation code provided. You can also manage and top-up your eSIMs with your Airalo account.

* Step 4: Enjoy connectivity whenever you are!

❤️ Why do we love eSIM?
* You aren’t disconnected during transit. With an eSIM, you can simply activate your service once you’ve arrived and you’re connected immediately.
* You don’t have to mess around with fragile, tiny hardware. Your eSIM is handled through an app, making things easier for everyone.
* It’s much easier to switch plans. Every eSIM from Airalo is prepaid and requires no contract, so you can top up your service or switch your plan whenever you want.
* Prices are clear and fair with no hidden fees.
* You can store multiple eSIMs on one device. That gives you the freedom to purchase your eSIMs ahead of time and simply activate them on arrival.

Enjoy!

---
Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: Global and Local Mobile Data for eSIM capable devices

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Airalo: eSIM Pocket Internet

creator: Airalo
descriptionHtml:
Airalo allows you to save up to 10x on mobile roaming data fees with amazing eSIM technology. Get one of our prepaid eSIM plans at affordable rates (starting from US$ 4.50). With coverage in over 200 countries and regions you can enjoy global connectivity 🌎. Just add an eSIM to your eSIM compatible device and stop worrying about staying connected while on your adventures.

Say ‘alo’ to freedom! 🎉

✈️ Who is Airalo best for?
Airalo is a perfect solution for anyone who travels - it doesn't matter whether you're on a boat, a plane, on a business trip or you just want to enjoy mobile data while visiting other countries - we’re here to provide you with instant connectivity while you travel..

🤑 How much does it cost?
* eSIMs from Airalo start from US$ 4.50 for 1GB of data.
* You can save with our Referral Program - get US$ 3 for every user you refer.

⭐ Why use Airalo?
* No more huge data roaming fees ✌️
* Installation in just a couple of minutes
* Easy top-ups, wherever you are
* Keep your existing number while traveling
* No more fiddling with pins and paperclips to change SIMs
* No need to carry a bulky WiFi dongle around

📲 What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is an embedded SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

📲 What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can install directly to your eSIM compatible device. It’s a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM for whatever local carriers exist in the country you’re currently in, the bonus is that you no longer need a fiddly, easily lost old-school plastic SIM card. eSIMs are a true technological revolution and we bring them right into your eSIM compatible device!
* You get access to local data services at affordable prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card, WiFi or paying for expensive roaming.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.

📲 Does an eSIM come with a number?
* Some of our eSIMs do and we're working on adding more into our store over time. Check your eSIM’s description for details.

📶 What devices support eSIM?
You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM compatible devices on this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

🤔 How does it work?
* Step 1: Install the Airalo app

* Step 2: Find an eSIM for your destination
(Airalo has eSIMs for over 190+ countries and regions and we're working 24/7 to expand our coverage.)

* Step 3: Purchase & install your eSIM
There are three ways to install your eSIM; most can be installed directly, if this isn’t possible you can use a QR code or install it manually.

* Step 4: Enjoy connectivity whenever you are!

❤️ Why do we love eSIMs?
* You aren’t disconnected during transit. With an eSIM, you can simply activate your service once you’ve arrived and you’re connected immediately.
* You don’t have to mess around with fiddly hardware. Your eSIM is handled through an app, making things simpler for everyone.
* It’s much easier to switch plans. Every eSIM from Airalo is prepaid and requires no contract, so you can top-up your service or switch your plan whenever you want.
* Prices are clear and fair with no hidden fees.
* You can store multiple eSIMs on one device. That gives you the freedom to purchase your eSIMs ahead of time and simply activate them on arrival.

Enjoy!

---
Visit airalo.com for more information.

Privacy Policy: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions

title:
Airalo: eSIM Global Internet
1.32.0

creator: Airalo
descriptionHtml:
Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. 🌎 Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

🤔What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and serves the same function as a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

✈️What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

📲How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan. Airalo has eSIMs for 200+ countries and regions.
3. Install the eSIM. This only takes a few minutes to complete.
4. Connect to a local network. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet when you arrive.
It's that easy!

🌎Available for 200+ countries and regions, including:
• United States
• United Kingdom
• Turkey
• Italy
• France
• Spain
• Japan
• Germany
• Canada
• Thailand
• Portugal
• Morocco
• Colombia
• India
• South Africa
• Ireland
• Mexico
• Egypt
• Dominican Republic
• Chile

⭐Why Airalo?
• Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.

• Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
• Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
• Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.
• Track and top up data on the go.
• Earn cashback rewards with every eSIM purchase.
• In a jam? Our support team is available 24/7.

🧡Why travelers love eSIMs:
• Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
• 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
• No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
• Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
• Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.
• Keep your existing number for 2FA authentications.
• Stay connected wherever you travel.

🔍eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
• An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
• eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
• Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details.

What devices are ready?
• You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
• Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
• Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
• Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
• Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!

🤔What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and serves the same function as a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

✈️What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. 📲How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan. Airalo has eSIMs for 200+ countries and regions.
3. Install the eSIM. This only takes a few minutes to complete.

It's that easy!

🌎Available for 200+ countries and regions, including:

• Turkey

• Spain

• Germany

• Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

title:
Airalo: eSIM Travel & Internet
1.50.1

creator: Airalo
descriptionHtml:
Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. 🌎 Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

🤔What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and serves the same function as a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

✈️What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

📲How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan. Airalo has eSIMs for 200+ countries and regions.
3. Install the eSIM. This only takes a few minutes to complete.
4. Connect to a local network. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet when you arrive.
It's that easy!

🌎Available for 200+ countries and regions, including:
• United States
• United Kingdom
• Turkey
• Italy
• France
• Spain
• Japan
• Germany
• Canada
• Thailand
• Portugal
• Morocco
• Colombia
• India
• South Africa
• Ireland
• Mexico
• Egypt
• Dominican Republic
• Chile

⭐Why Airalo?
• Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.

• Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
• Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
• Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.
• Track and top up data on the go.
• Earn cashback rewards with every eSIM purchase.
• In a jam? Our support team is available 24/7.

🧡Why travelers love eSIMs:
• Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
• 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
• No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
• Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
• Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.
• Keep your existing number for 2FA authentications.
• Stay connected wherever you travel.

🔍eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
• An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
• eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
• Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details.

What devices are ready?
• You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
• Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
• Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
• Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
• Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!
–
Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help

Join the Airalo community!
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: Sim Card App, Chat, Travel, Grab Your Phone, Connect To Fast Internet Now

It's that easy!

🌎Available for 200+ countries and regions, including:
• United States
• United Kingdom
• Turkey
• Italy
• France
• Spain
• Japan
• Germany
• Canada
• Thailand
• Portugal
• Morocco
• Colombia
• India
• South Africa

⭐Why Airalo?
• Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.

• Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
• Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
• Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.
• Track and top up data on the go.
• Earn cashback rewards with every eSIM purchase.
• In a jam? Our support team is available 24/7.

🧡Why travelers love eSIMs:
• Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
• 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
• No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
• Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
• Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.
• Keep your existing number for 2FA authentications.
• Stay connected wherever you travel.

🔍eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
• An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
• eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
• Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details.

What devices are ready?
• You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
• Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
• Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
• Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
• Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!

• An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
• eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
• Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details.

What devices are ready?
• You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
• Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
• Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
• Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
• Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!

What is an eSIM?

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?

Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy

Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
descriptionShort: Affordable, global connection (eSIM)

- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy

Terms & Conditions

- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

title:
Airalo: eSIM Travel & Internet
1.69.0

creator: Airalo
descriptionHtml:
Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and functions like a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy

Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
